detailsSection:
Moscow High School #548 “Tsaritsyno” (Education Center 548) has been selected to be part of the Microsoft Innovative Schools World Tour due to being a showcase example of the following Innovation Topics:

1. Personalized learning environments. Use of systematic continuous assessment to change the course of student learning and for remediation.
2. Project-based learning environments. Students work in groups to solve problems, make decisions, and go on knowledge quests, while the teacher acts as facilitator.
3. 1:1 learning environments. Students work on their own devices and can use technology at any time to access educational tools.
detailsSection_file_name: moscow high school 548 tsaritsyno case study final.docx
